contest-event.event-date:
July 25, 1903 D Rishton Contest
Rishton Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
rishton
Own Choice from a Specified List
Cricket Field, Blackburn Road, Rishton, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £12, 2nd £8, 3rd £5, 4th £2, 5th £1. 1st annual contest promoted by Rishton Old Band. 9 bands entered, 8 bands competed.
Choice of test pieces: "Casket of Gems", "Gems of British Song" or "Don Pasquale"
June 16, 2013, 1:43 p.m. July 25, 2016, 9:12 p.m.
1 Blackburn Town Angus Holden
2 Hebden Bridge Band William Heap
3 Wilpshire Robert Rimmer
4 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band William Halliwell
5 Helmshore Prize Band William Halliwell
Unknown Result Clayton le Moors Alexander Owen
Unknown Result Longridge Band Robert Rimmer
Unknown Result Newhallhey R. Fletcher
